attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The incapacity Benifit system is flawed the 1967 law was amended in 1997 meaning that if you were ill and had to stop working if your Benifit was stopped after seeing the Benifits doctor you can appeal but it will make no differance because once that decision has been made by the doctor you have NO RIGHTS AT ALL NO MATTER WHAT YOU DO this is so unfair a lot of people are suffering both financialy and health wise this is against human rights

rejection.details: you need to re-submit with a proper title for your petition - not your name
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
